__e: Of course, maybe that's just what the lads say when they want me feeling sorry for them.
Told him about us, our family, and how sorry I am about what happened to his wife and child.
I mean, I guess I feel sorry for her, but she made a bad call, it's not the first time, either.
Um, I hope you don't mind, but I-I brought someone.
I hope you don't mind, but I saw that Eddie lost his yesterday.
I hope you don't mind... but I brought your brothers along.
I hope you don't mind, but... whenever possible, I'd enjoy your company.
Hope you don't mind but, you've been sleeping for two days and I usually try to do...
I still haven't heard from my mother, not that it bothers me but it has been two days.
I hope you don't mind my asking... what was it that turned you to the light?
Sam, I hope you don't mind me asking you this, but have you ever thought of your wife getting on top?
So, I hope you don't mind me asking like this, but... I mean, do you have anyone special in your life?
I hope it's okay, I brought a few friends.
I... I hope it's okay I poured myself a drink.
Espero que no te importe que los haya tra? do para ver! Eon, deja salir a los chicos!
So, I hope you don't mind me asking like this, but... I mean, do you have anyone special in your life?
It's an honour to have you with us, sir... and I hope you won't mind me saying... but I thought your last book was even better than the first.
Sam, I hope you don't mind me asking you this, but have you ever thought of your wife getting on top?
Hope it's not weird, me just showing up.
I hope you don't mind my mentioning this... but you have written a book, have you not?
I mean, you don't have to answer if you don't want to.
